summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5778 for the improvement of 36th Avenue Northeast, from East 41st Street to Sand Point Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76187 as amended by Ordinance No. 76296, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
